languages.text: "Почтенный Заккари Вайс умеет творить ритуал мыслечтения. Эта практика позволяет ему бегло обозревать умы тысяч людей и выявлять среди экипажа тех, кого он ищет. Это весьма редкий и опасный ритуал, и лишь такой мастер, как господин Вайс, способен провести его".

"The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."
languages.original_text: "Почтенный Заккари Вайс умеет творить ритуал мыслечтения. Эта практика позволяет ему бегло обозревать умы тысяч людей и выявлять среди экипажа тех, кого он ищет. Это весьма редкий и опасный ритуал, и лишь такой мастер, как господин Вайс, способен провести его".

traits.locale_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplished such a feat."

"The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplished such a feat."

"The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplished such a feat."

"The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplished such a feat."

"The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."

"The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplished such a feat."

languages.text: «El estimado Zacchary Weisz puede realizar el ritual de la lectura de pensamientos. Eso le permitirá realizar un examen superficial de las mentes de miles de personas en busca de unos individuos concretos. Es un ritual tan excepcional como arriesgado, y solo alguien tan versado como el maestro Weisz sería capaz de completarlo».
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."

traits.locale_text: «El estimado Zacchary Weisz puede realizar el ritual de la lectura de pensamientos. Eso le permitirá realizar un examen superficial de las mentes de miles de personas en busca de unos individuos concretos. Es un ritual tan excepcional como arriesgado, y solo alguien tan versado como el maestro Weisz sería capaz de completarlo».

languages.text: 「崇高なるザッカリー・ワイズは、思考読解の儀式を行うことができます。実行すれば、彼は何千人もの人々の心をざっと調べ、特定の人物を探し出すことができるのです。この儀式は危険であると同時に滅多に行われないもので、マスター・ワイズのような熟練者でなければ、これほどすごい儀式はできません」
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."

traits.locale_text: 「崇高なるザッカリー・ワイズは、思考読解の儀式を行うことができます。実行すれば、彼は何千人もの人々の心をざっと調べ、特定の人物を探し出すことができるのです。この儀式は危険であると同時に滅多に行われないもので、マスター・ワイズのような熟練者でなければ、これほどすごい儀式はできません」
「崇高なるザッカリー・ワイズは、思考読解の儀式を行うことができます。実行すれば、彼は何千人もの人々の心をざっと調べ、特定の人物を探し出すことができるのです。この儀式は危険であると同時に滅多に行われないもので、マスター・ワイズのような熟練者でなければ、これほどすごい儀式はできません」

languages.text: “尊敬的扎卡里·威茨可以举行仪式，洞察他人的思想。这种意识可以粗略地检查成千上万人的思想，用来寻找某些特定的人物。这种仪式既罕见、又危险，只有像威茨大师这种精通灵能的人，才能完成这样的壮举。”
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的扎卡里·威茨可以举行仪式，洞察他人的思想。这种意识可以粗略地检查成千上万人的思想，用来寻找某些特定的人物。这种仪式既罕见、又危险，只有像威茨大师这种精通灵能的人，才能完成这样的壮举。”
“尊敬的扎卡里·威茨可以举行仪式，洞察他人的思想。这种意识可以粗略地检查成千上万人的思想，用来寻找某些特定的人物。这种仪式既罕见、又危险，只有像威茨大师这种精通灵能的人，才能完成这样的壮举。”

languages.text: "Der geschätzte Zacchary Weisz kann das Ritual des Gedankenlesens ausführen. Durch diese Praxis kann er den Verstand von Tausenden oberflächlich prüfen, um bestimmte Personen zu finden. Ein Ritual so selten wie gefährlich, und nur jemand, der so versiert ist wie Meister Weisz, kann es ausführen."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."

traits.locale_text: "Der geschätzte Zacchary Weisz kann das Ritual des Gedankenlesens ausführen. Durch diese Praxis kann er den Verstand von Tausenden oberflächlich prüfen, um bestimmte Personen zu finden. Ein Ritual so selten wie gefährlich, und nur jemand, der so versiert ist wie Meister Weisz, kann es ausführen."

"Der geschätzte Zacchary Weisz kann das Ritual des Gedankenlesens ausführen. Durch diese Praxis kann er den Verstand von Tausenden oberflächlich prüfen, um bestimmte Personen zu finden. Ein Ritual so selten wie gefährlich, und nur jemand, der so versiert ist wie Meister Weisz, kann es ausführen."

languages.text: « L'honorable Zacchary Weisz peut accomplir le rituel de lecture télépathique, un examen sommaire des esprits de milliers de gens visant à identifier des individus précis. C'est un talent aussi rare que dangereux, et seul un expert comme le maître-astropathe peut réussir un tel exploit. »
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."

traits.locale_text: « L'honorable Zacchary Weisz peut accomplir le rituel de lecture télépathique, un examen sommaire des esprits de milliers de gens visant à identifier des individus précis. C'est un talent aussi rare que dangereux, et seul un expert comme le maître-astropathe peut réussir un tel exploit. »

languages.text: "Muhterem Zacchary Weisz, düşünce okuma ayinini gerçekleştirebilir. Bu uygulama, belirli bireyleri aramak için binlerce insanın zihnini üstünkörü bir şekilde incelemesine olanak tanır. Tehlikeli olduğu kadar nadir gerçekleştirilen bir ayindir ve yalnızca Üstat Weisz kadar hünerli bir şahıs, böylesine bir başarıya imza atabilir."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Zacchary Weisz can perform the ritual of thought reading. This practice lets him do a cursory examination of the minds of thousands of people in search of certain individuals. A ritual as rare as it is dangerous, and only someone as versed as Master Weisz can accomplish such a feat."
